infos.value: You are coming along nicely. Now, I shall provide some brief explanations regarding the Home screen.
Now, I shall explain Challenge Missions.
The Beginner's Hall in particular rewards new recruits with plenty of useful items, so I highly recommend paying it a visit.

When you receive items such as <color=#00ffff>Login Bonuses</color> or <color=#00ffff>Ranking Rewards</color>, you can obtain them from the <color=#00ffff>Presents</color> menu. Be sure to check it often.
By clearing missions every day, you can <color=#00ffff>more or less play all elements of the game</color>.

The most important points to learn when starting out have been arranged in a <color=#00ffff>bingo-style</color> <color=#00ffff>mission board</color>. You can earn <color=#00ffff>rewards</color> for each mission you clear.
You can learn the basics of battle by questing in the Beginner's Hall. Clearing these quests will earn you <color=#00ffff>Visiore</color>.
Proceed to a tutorial on Challenge Missions?
